actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Army to carry out such activities as are necessary to stabilize the bluffs along the Mississippi River in the vicinity of Natchez, Mississippi, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Historic Natchez Bluffs Stabilization Act - Directs the Secretary of the Army to carry out activities to stabilize the bluffs along the Mississippi River in the vicinity of Natchez, Mississippi. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Army to carry out such activities as are necessary to stabilize the bluffs along the Mississippi River in the vicinity of Natchez, Mississippi, and for other purposes.
